title: #135: Looking at the Witness Protection Program with Bobby Chacon
description:
Lisa Zambetti and RCP Producer Paul Francis Sullivan sit down with former FBI agent Bobby Chacon to discuss the witness protection program. Bobby describes his experience putting witnesses into the program, the process of keeping people safe and his involvement on the movie GoodFellas.


Sponsored by StichFix
